channel.title: Comments on: Madonna in The Burning Crusade

item.title: By: MMODump.com » Some Friday afternoon humor
item.dc:creator: MMODump.com » Some Friday afternoon humor
item.description: [...] Friday afternoon humor Some Friday afternoon humor: “It is finally Friday. Woot. As it is getting to be a little later in the afternoon, I canonly assume you have quit working for the day. And if not, you definitely should. But if you can’t, here are a couple items to get you through your Friday afternoon a little faster… [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Friday afternoon humor Some Friday afternoon humor: “It is finally Friday. Woot. As it is getting to be a little later in the afternoon, I canonly assume you have quit working for the day. And if not, you definitely should. But if you can’t, here are a couple items to get you through your Friday afternoon a little faster… […]

item.title: By: Eradon
item.dc:creator: Eradon
item.description: I can't say I'm surprised that she's on there, with all the publicity she has been doing lately... Or maybe, it's a sign. Maybe in the near future we will be sitting in the cinema, eargely waiting to see the horror that is Lady Sylvannas in the WoW epic movie. Then BAM, 300 people sitting there looking at an ageold singer/model/actor(WTF?) with makeups trying to make her look undead, but only making her look slightly better. Dear God, I beg of you, strike her down.
item.content:encoded:
I can’t say I’m surprised that she’s on there, with all the publicity she has been doing lately… Or maybe, it’s a sign. Maybe in the near future we will be sitting in the cinema, eargely waiting to see the horror that is Lady Sylvannas in the WoW epic movie. Then BAM, 300 people sitting there looking at an ageold singer/model/actor(WTF?) with makeups trying to make her look undead, but only making her look slightly better.
Dear God, I beg of you, strike her down.

item.title: By: Jade Reporting » Blog Archive » Friday, October 27
item.dc:creator: Jade Reporting » Blog Archive » Friday, October 27

item.title: By: Stromm
item.dc:creator: Stromm
item.description: Its my understanding that in game Madonna has adopted an undead warrior from Brill, but there is some controversy with the Father. BTW - I hear those Iron Plate Breast Cones are gonna be hard to buy!
item.content:encoded:
Its my understanding that in game Madonna has adopted an undead warrior from Brill, but there is some controversy with the Father.
BTW – I hear those Iron Plate Breast Cones are gonna be hard to buy!

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: The Gnome reminds me of <a href="http://www.imdb.com/gallery/hh/0080524/HH/0080524/iid_1064334.jpg?path=pgallery&path_key=Bialik, Mayim" rel="nofollow">Mayim Bialk</a> except with Tezuka eyes.
item.content:encoded: The Gnome reminds me of Mayim Bialk except with Tezuka eyes.

item.title: By: samhaine
item.dc:creator: samhaine
item.description:
<blockquote>they are all female except for the dwarf, unless that is a dwarf female.</blockquote>
A little-publicized facet of the expansion is a new aspect of the Lore. Shortly after the arrival of the Dranei, the dwarves declared that they had "reserved the Eastern Kingdoms for Hot Chicks." They are now leading a campaign to keep all the dudes of other races over in Kalimdor or in the Outlands.
item.content:encoded:
they are all female except for the dwarf, unless that is a dwarf female.

A little-publicized facet of the expansion is a new aspect of the Lore. Shortly after the arrival of the Dranei, the dwarves declared that they had “reserved the Eastern Kingdoms for Hot Chicks.” They are now leading a campaign to keep all the dudes of other races over in Kalimdor or in the Outlands.

item.title: By: Dreaming
item.dc:creator: Dreaming
item.description:
No, that would be running BWL for the 20948039804th time that's causing the brain damage.
Friends don't let friends raid sober.
item.content:encoded:
No, that would be running BWL for the 20948039804th time that’s causing the brain damage.

Friends don’t let friends raid sober.

item.title: By: heather
item.dc:creator: heather
item.description: I fear for your brain cells, Foton. Such unbridled speculation could lead to... doomage. Or at least rampant brain cell implosion. Take your pick.
item.content:encoded: I fear for your brain cells, Foton. Such unbridled speculation could lead to… doomage. Or at least rampant brain cell implosion. Take your pick.
